ygData.subject: RE: Recommend place for hunting
ygData.msgSnippet: Try the bandit camp at G Faydark.  They spawn 3 bandits at one time, so best is to share the site with another person but hunt solo.  Another alternative is to
ygData.messageBody:
Try the bandit camp at G Faydark. They spawn 3 bandits at one time, so
best is to share the site with another person but hunt solo. Another
alternative is to make a lvl 5-8 team with local kakis (many still at
Faydark) for hunting there.

On Sunday, 11 July, 1999 9:35 PM, Entreri [SMTP:drizzt@...]
wrote:
> Can anyone recommend a level7 Ranger a good place to hunt in Faywder
preferably a good soloing location.Thx
>
> BTW,I level9 then come over antonica,get spells first ;P and hor,in
antonica,can get ranger spells?
